Row.Text: AI Cannot Spread Religion to Humans
AI players cannot use missionaries and great prophets to spread their religion to cities owned by human players.
AI players cannot use missionaries and great prophets to spread their religion to cities owned by human players.
AI Cannot Build World Wonders
AI players cannot build world projects or wonders.
AI players cannot build world projects or wonders.
AI Always Accepts White Peace
AI players will always accept White Peace offers by humans.
AI players will always accept White Peace offers by humans.
AI Cannot Build Settlers
AI Cannot Build Settlers
AI players will never build units that can settle.
